item.title: Pioneering Street Art - Blek le Rat
item.description: In the world of street art and graphic design, the name Blek le Rat resonates through urban landscapes of creativity and rebellion.

item.title: Introducing: SerbLink
item.description: We are thrilled to announce an exciting new partnership between Tech9320 and SerbLink, a Canadian company dedicated to connecting Serbian professionals and businesses while empowering them with the resources needed to achieve their professional goals.

item.title: Susan Kare - Pixels of Innovation
item.description: In the vast expanse of technology’s landscape, where innovation and creativity intertwine, there are individuals who leave an indelible mark on the industry.

item.title: Introducing: Elementals!
item.description: We are thrilled to unveil our latest project, Elementals, a mesmerizing NFT collection that encapsulates the essence of nature’s elemental forces.

item.title: Farewell to Passwords, Welcome Passkeys
item.description: New, more secure and much convenient method of authentication is in expansion and threatens to replace passwords as method of authentication we are all used to.

item.title: Angular Signals
item.description: Hello to all fans of Angular framework, we have some great news for you.

item.title: Node.js - latest versions and features
item.description: Node.js is a popular JavaScript runtime that allows developers to build scalable and high-performance applications.

item.title: ECMAscript 2023 - Arrays++
item.description: ECMAScript 2023, the next planned update to the official specification for the JavaScript programming language, is right around the corner.

item.title: Progressive Web Applications
item.description: For a long time if you were looking for a application that users could access through different devices, you would have to build a separate application for each platform.

item.title: Supply Chain Forum
item.description: Recently, we had the opportunity to present our project, Agroinvest, at the Supply Chain Forum as Tech9320, which was a great honor for us.

item.title: First Place at the Open Data Competition
item.description: The Open Data competition, organized by Egzakta Advisory and the Research and Development Center of the Faculty of Organizational Sciences, was completed on Thursday, December 22nd.

item.title: It's alive!
item.description: With this post, we officially open the website of our freelancing team - Tech9320.
